perturbation.original_text: 5.  Allied's License to Newegg 5.1 Allied grants Newegg a non-exclusive, royalty-free, non-assignable, non-transferable, and non- sublicensable worldwide license to use, publicly display, transmit, broadcast, stream, distribute and reproduce the Allied Marks in all approved forms and in manners for the purposes of this Agreement during the Term. Allied acknowledges and agrees that Newegg shall not pay any fees or royalties for the license of the Allied Marks, except the Sponsorship Fee specified in Schedule 3. 5.2 Without limitation of any other provision of this Agreement, failure by Allied to comply with the provisions of Sections 5.1 shall be deemed as a material breach of this Agreement and Newegg has the right to terminate this Agreement subject first to the cure provisions in Section 14.1 and be discharged from any further obligation to pay the Sponsorship Fee. If any portion of the Sponsorship Fee shall have previously been paid for any period following such termination by Newegg, the Sponsorship Fee shall be prorated and Allied shall immediately refund the portion corresponding to the unused period of the Term.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.  Allied's License to Newegg 5.1 Allied grants Newegg a non-exclusive, royalty-free, non-assignable, non-transferable, and non- sublicensable worldwide license to use, publicly display, transmit, broadcast, stream, distribute and reproduce the Allied Marks in all forms and in manners for the purposes of this Agreement during the Term. Allied acknowledges and agrees that Newegg shall pay royalties for the license of the Allied Marks, in addition to the Sponsorship Fee specified in Schedule 3. The royalty amount and payment schedule for these licenses will be mutually agreed upon by both parties in writing at least 30 days prior to each calendar quarter. 5.2 Without limitation of any other provision of this Agreement, failure by Allied to comply with the provisions of Sections 5.1 shall be deemed as a material breach of this Agreement and Newegg has the right to terminate this Agreement subject first to the cure provisions in Section 14.1 and be discharged from any further obligation to pay the Sponsorship Fee. If any portion of the Sponsorship Fee shall have previously been paid for any period following such termination by Newegg, the Sponsorship Fee will not be refunded.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that Newegg shall not pay any fees or royalties for the license of the Allied Marks, except the Sponsorship Fee. The modified version introduces a direct contradiction by stating that Newegg *shall* pay royalties in *addition* to the Sponsorship Fee. Furthermore, it removes the refund provision upon termination, directly contradicting what was initially agreed upon.

perturbation.original_text: 7.  Exclusivity of Sponsorship Rights for Newegg 7.1 In all of Allied's actions and publications (in all media and formats) in connection with the marketing and conducting of the Events, where possible and appropriate, Allied shall where reasonably practicable communicate that Newegg is the exclusive sponsor of the Arena for the technology e-commerce and online retailer categories. 7.2 Allied shall not endorse, or permit the marketing of any other company whose principal business is as an e-commerce provider at or in connection with the Arena. For purposes of clarity, this is not meant to prohibit incidental third-party endorsements not controlled by Allied such as individual player and team sponsorships of participants in events at the Arena.
perturbation.changed_text: 7.  Exclusivity of Sponsorship Rights for Newegg 7.1 In all of Allied's actions and publications (in all media and formats) in connection with the marketing and conducting of the Events, Allied shall communicate that Newegg may or may not be the exclusive sponsor of the Arena for the technology e-commerce and online retailer categories, at Allied's sole discretion. 7.2 Allied may endorse, and permit the marketing of other companies whose principal business is as an e-commerce provider at or in connection with the Arena, but Allied shall make a good-faith effort to ensure that Newegg receives favorable treatment relative to the other e-commerce companies. For purposes of clarity, this now includes any third-party endorsements controlled by Allied such as individual player and team sponsorships of participants in events at the Arena.
perturbation.explanation: The original text promises exclusivity to Newegg as the sponsor. The modified version introduces uncertainty by stating that Newegg's exclusive sponsor status is at Allied's discretion, thus removing any guarantees of exclusivity. Also, it changes the second part to permit endorsement and marketing from other competitors which opposes the premise of exclusivity.

perturbation.original_text: 13.3 Confidentiality of Agreement. Other than as permitted in this Agreement, neither Party will disclose any terms of this Agreement except: (a) as required by law, or (b) pursuant to a mutually agreeable press release. Press releases concerning Newegg's sponsorship of the Events will only be published after written preapproval by both Parties, provided that if for any reason the Parties cannot agree about a specific release, Newegg shall have the ultimate decision-making right concerning whether to issue any press releases about this Agreement or Newegg's sponsorship of the Events. 13.4 Return of Confidential Information. Upon any termination or expiration of this Agreement, Allied shall deliver to Newegg all originals and copies of any material in any form containing or representing Newegg's Marks and other Confidential Information of Newegg or, at Newegg's request, shall destroy the same and provide Newegg a certification of the destruction.
perturbation.changed_text: 13.3 Confidentiality of Agreement. Either Party can disclose any terms of this agreement as they see fit. Press releases concerning Newegg's sponsorship of the Events will only be published after written preapproval by one Party, and either party shall have the decision-making right concerning whether to issue any press releases about this Agreement or Newegg's sponsorship of the Events. 13.4 Return of Confidential Information. Upon any termination or expiration of this Agreement, Allied may keep all originals and copies of any material in any form containing or representing Newegg's Marks and other Confidential Information of Newegg and there is no obligation for destruction or certification of destruction of such material.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that neither party is allowed to disclose the terms of this agreement, but this is contradicted in the updated text in which it allows either party to disclose as they see fit. It also changes the approval process to one party and removes the requirement to return confidential information. It completely reverses the confidentiality obligations.
